metadata.title: Clean PigGo - Free Online AI Watermark Remover | Remove Image Watermarks
metadata.description: Clean PigGo is a free online AI watermark remover. Remove AI-generated watermarks (Gemini, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, Kling, etc.), image watermarks, text watermarks, and logo watermarks. Powered by LaMa deep learning model, runs entirely in your browser for privacy protection.

hero.badge: AI Powered Â· Free to Use
hero.description: Easily remove watermarks, text, and unwanted objects from images using advanced AI technology.
hero.descriptionSub: No registration required. Processed entirely in your browser to protect your privacy.

howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.description: Just a few simple steps to remove watermarks from your images

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Drag & drop or click to upload the image you want to process

select.title: Select Area
select.description: Use the eraser tool to paint over the watermark area

process.title: AI Processing
process.description: LaMa model automatically analyzes and fills the selected area

download.title: Download Result
download.description: Preview the result and download the processed image

features.title: Powerful
features.description: Professional image restoration powered by LaMa deep learning model

smartErase.title: Smart Erase
smartErase.description: Select areas to remove with the eraser tool, AI automatically fills the background

realtime.title: Real-time Processing
realtime.description: WebGL-accelerated ONNX Runtime enables processing directly in your browser

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All processing happens locally, images never leave your device

mask.title: Mask Technology
mask.description: Precise mask generation ensures only selected areas are processed

compare.title: Live Compare
compare.description: Compare before and after side by side with the slider

export.title: HD Export
export.description: Export results at original resolution, maintaining image quality

footer.copyright: Powered by LaMa model, running on ONNX Runtime Web in browser.

canvas.touchHint: Paint over the area to remove

modelLoading.hint: First load requires ~200MB download, cached for future use
